body.p: IASC acknowledged that a current asset‑specific market‑determined rate would rarely exist for the assets covered by IAS 36. Therefore, an enterprise uses current market‑determined rates for other assets (as similar as possible to the asset under review) as a starting point and adjusts these rates to reflect the risks specific to the asset for which the cash flow projections have not been adjusted.
